name: Smash of the Klopse
description:
***Don't slash the slimes too fast!***
The game breaking bug of invincible slimes is less likely to occur if slow down your slime slashing. This will be fixed after the jam so you can mash the button to your hearts content =)

The build needed too long to finish so I couldn't submit but that's my entry to the Boundless Game Jam =)

EDIT: Thanks to Reece Geofroy I was able to late submit the game - he totally rocks! <3

I had so much more planned but that's how far I got without any help. Maybe I should look for a team next time but it still was so much fun and I learned so much so I'm super happy with what I've got =D

Known bugs (I'm sorry >.<):
 - There are sometimes slimes that don't want to be smashed but I couldn't fix that in time, [Sadly this a game breaking one =( ]
 - Not really a bug but there's no music or sound effects^^"
